918860.name: Rise of the Badlands
918860.description:
Welcome to the RPG World of Infestation: Germany! You are in a retro universe of a Planet which is infested by Zombies and you have to fight with other online players to get out alive.

We're writing year 2023 and Germany is infested by a new virus. First a few people were sick and died shortly after contact, few hours later they were back. ALIVE. After 3 weeks 95% of the german population has turned to zombies. Grab your friends, your gear and survive in this world.

Warning: This Game Is A Retro-Style RPG Game in 2D-Base, But Zombies Can Eat You.

  • VOIP
  • Multiplayer
  • RPG Style World
  • Free Roaming
  • Zombie-KI

Can you Survive the Horde?
918860.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
